targets.expr:
rate(velor_data_client_sync_latencies_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", label="propose_to_sync_latency"}[1m])/rate(velor_data_client_sync_latencies_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", label="propose_to_sync_latency"}[1m])
-
quantile(0.67, rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role="validator", stage="committed"}[$interval]) / rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role="validator", stage="committed"}[$interval])) < 1000000

panels.title: Average propose to sync latencies: state sync only (seconds)

panels.description: The latencies taken from when data is first proposed, to when it is finally synced.

targets.expr:
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(velor_data_client_sync_latencies_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",role=~"$role",label="propose_to_sync_latency"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le))
-
quantile(0.67, rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role="validator", stage="committed"}[$interval]) / rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role="validator", stage="committed"}[$interval])) < 1000000

histogram_quantile(0.70, sum(rate(velor_data_client_sync_latencies_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",role=~"$role",label="propose_to_sync_latency"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le))
-
quantile(0.67, rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role="validator", stage="committed"}[$interval]) / rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role="validator", stage="committed"}[$interval])) < 1000000

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(velor_data_client_sync_latencies_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",role=~"$role",label="propose_to_sync_latency"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le))
-
quantile(0.67, rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role="validator", stage="committed"}[$interval]) / rate(velor_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role="validator", stage="committed"}[$interval])) < 1000000
